cards.flavor_text: [i]Daddy here abandoned my mother and I, left us for dead so he could cook up demonic weapons for the Order. My good looks are about all I got from him.[/i]

cards.flavor_text: [i]They hide between the edges of the sea and the Underworld. They wait for stray wanderers and feast on them.[/i]

cards.rules_text: When this battle enters, discard any number of cards, then draw that many cards. Create Freki and Geri, a legendary red 3/3 Devil Dog creature token with menace.
cards.notes: Patched (Don't draw an extra card on ETB, The Despair Embodied no longer has Wither)

cards.flavor_text: [i]A six-chamber revolver that fires two shots at a time? What kinda whackjob thinks up something like that? ...I love it![/i]

cards.rules_text:
[i]Electromagnetic[/i] — Whenever this creature attacks or blocks, it gets +2/+2 until end of turn for each artifact defending player controls [i](when blocking, that's you)[/i].
[i]Devil Arm[/i] — When this creature dies, exile it. While it's exiled, you may cast its other face.

This is a Demon and not a Devil because Trish is inside it

cards.rules_text:
Gain a Stylish Rank. 
Gunslinger Style deals 3 damage to any target. 
[i]Rainstorm[/i] — If your Stylish Rank is A or higher, it also deals 2 damage to another target and 1 damage to a third target.

Bestow upon artifact {2}{R} [i](If you cast this card for its bestow cost, it's an Aura spell with enchant artifact. It becomes a creature again if it's not attached.)[/i]
You control enchanted artifact. It's a Demon creature with base power and toughness equal to its mana value in addition to its other types.
Whenever this creature attacks [i](and isn't an Aura)[/i], you may attach target Equipment to it.

Buyback—{1}, return an Equipment you control to your hand. [i](You may pay an additional {1} and return an Equipment you control to your hand as you cast this spell. If you do, put this card into your hand as it resolves.)[/i]
Round Trip deals 3 damage divided as you choose among one, two, or three targets.

[i]Chimera Assault[/i] — Whenever Echidna enters or attacks, create a 1/1 Plant creature token with “{1}, exile this creature: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.”
[i]Devil Arm[/i] — When Echidna dies, exile it. While it's exiled, you may cast its other face.
cards.notes:
Patched (no longer triggers on block)

Nero

cards.rules_text:
Gain a Stylish Rank. 
Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle. 
[i]MAX-Act[/i] — If your Stylish Rank is A or higher, search your library for another card that shares a land type with it, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
[i]Teeming with Beetles — [/i]When this creature dies, create a number of 1/1 black and green Insect creature tokens equal to its toughness.
cards.flavor_text: [i]A demon made out of sacks filled with Trypoxylus. The bugs are unintelligent on their own, but moving as one, they animate a demon that's... also unintelligent.[/i]

cards.rules_text:
This spell costs {X} less to cast, where X is the greatest power among creatures you control.
This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.

[i]Melt Slag — [/i]Whenever a nontoken artifact is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on Goliath.
[i]Devouring Vortex[/i] — {1}{G}, sacrifice an artifact: Goliath fights target creature you don't control. [i](Each deals damage equal to its power to the other.)[/i]
Until end of turn, players can't sacrifice permanents and creatures can't die or be exiled.
cards.flavor_text: [i]“I couldn't protect Credo. To this day, I hate myself for not having enough strength. But this time is different. I swear!”[/i]

cards.rules_text:
When this artifact enters, mill three cards, then return up to one target artifact or creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
Whenever one or more artifact or creature cards leave your graveyard, put a +1/+1 counter on up to one target creature.
cards.flavor_text: [i]Whenever Nero needed a resupply, he seemed to find one of these. Don't ask me how they still worked.[/i]

cards.rules_text: Each artifact, enchantment, Demon, and Devil card in your hand has cycling {2}. [i]({2}, discard that card: Draw a card.)[/i]

Trample
When this Vehicle enters or attacks, you may destroy target artifact or target Wall. If you controlled that artifact or Wall, draw a card. 
Crew 1

cards.flavor_text: [i]Smack one of these bugs around and Red Orbs go flying everywhere — if you're quick, you can grab a fortune! [/i]

cards.rules_text:
Squad {2} [i](As an additional cost to cast this spell, you may pay {2} any number of times. When this creature enters, create that many tokens that are copies of it.)[/i]
If one or more +1/+1 counters would be put on this creature, that many plus one of those counters are put on it instead.

Haste, reach
Whenever Nero attacks, you may cast an Aura or Equipment spell with mana value less than his power without paying its mana cost, then attach it to him. At the beginning of your next end step, you may pay that permanent's mana cost. If you don't pay, sacrifice it, draw a card, and gain a Stylish Rank. 
Devil Hunter
cards.notes:
Patched (Lost Trample, gained Reach, has Breakers instead of MAX-Act)

Helpful Note: Sacrificing the permanent is not a cost. If it's already gone, you can just draw the card!
